Sentencas: Electrolytes with high ionic diffusivity at temperatures distinctively lower than the presently used ones are the prerequisite for the success of, e. g., solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory

Sentencas: We have found a promising structure having an asymmetric but superior ionic mobility in the direction of the oxygen-ion current.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory

Sentencas: Using a layering of zirconium and yttrium in the fluorite structure of zirconia, a high vacancy concentration and a low migration barrier in two dimensions are obtained, while the mobility in the third direction is basically sacrificed.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory

Sentencas: According to our density functional theory calculations an electrolyte made of this structure could operate at a temperature reduced by approximate to 200 degrees C.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory

Sentencas: Thus a window to a different class of electrolytes has been flung open.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory

Sentencas: In our structure the price paid is a more complicated manufacturing method.
Titulo: Enhanced anisotropic ionic diffusion in layered electrolyte structures from density functional theory
